pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, September 4, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Surrey, British Columbia

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, Premier of British Columbia John Horgan, Mayor of Vancouver Gregor Robertson, and Mayor of Surrey Linda Hepner will make a transit announcement. A media availability will follow.

Simon Fraser University, Surrey Campus
250-13450 102 Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should present themselves at the registration desk in the main lobby no later than 12:00 p.m.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, Minister of National Defence Harjit Sajjan, and Minister of Border Security and Organized Crime Reduction Bill Blair will participate in a roundtable discussion on Gangs and Gun Control.

Tong Louie Family YMCA
14988 57 Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should arrive via the rear parking lot entrance no later than 2:30 p.m.

Media appearances

2:00 p.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on NEWS 1130.

5:20 p.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Red 93.1 FM Vancouver.
